reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Quality and Style - The Perfect Casual Button Down Cotton Linen Shirt!
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of acquiring the Casual Button Down Cotton Linen Shirt, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way. This shirt effortlessly blends comfort, style, and exceptional quality, making it a true standout in my wardrobe. Allow me to share my experience with this remarkable piece of clothing.First and foremost, the fabric used in this shirt is a delightful combination of cotton and linen. This blend ensures a soft and breathable feel against the skin, making it an ideal choice for warm weather or casual occasions. The shirt is remarkably lightweight, allowing for optimal comfort even during extended wear. It's the perfect option for those seeking a relaxed, laid-back style without compromising on elegance.The craftsmanship of this shirt is impeccable. The attention to detail is evident in every stitch, giving it a sense of durability and longevity. The buttons are securely fastened and glide effortlessly through the buttonholes, emphasizing the overall quality of the garment. It's evident that the manufacturer took great care in producing a product that will stand the test of time.The design of this shirt is equally impressive. The band collar adds a touch of sophistication and versatility, making it suitable for both casual and slightly more formal occasions. The long sleeves provide an extra layer of comfort and can easily be rolled up for a more relaxed look. The shirt also features a button-down front, allowing for easy on and off, as well as a neat and polished appearance.What truly sets this shirt apart is its ability to effortlessly transition from a day at the beach to an evening gathering. The versatile nature of this piece allows for a wide range of styling options. Pair it with chinos or linen trousers for a sophisticated beachside ensemble, or wear it untucked with your favorite shorts for a relaxed and effortlessly cool look.In terms of fit, I found the sizing to be accurate and true to expectations. The shirt draped elegantly on my frame without feeling constricting. However, I recommend referring to the size chart provided by the manufacturer to ensure the perfect fit for your body type.To summarize, the Casual Button Down Cotton Linen Shirt is a rare find in the realm of casual attire. Its exceptional quality, remarkable craftsmanship, and stylish design make it a standout choice for anyone seeking a comfortable and versatile shirt. Whether you're lounging on the beach, attending a social gathering, or simply running errands, this shirt will effortlessly elevate your style game. I wholeheartedly recommend this exceptional piece of clothing to anyone in search of a high-quality, casual button-down shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently got this shirt, and it has quickly become one of my favorite clothing purchases. What stands out the most is the fantastic fit, especially for plus-size individuals like myself. It’s incredibly comfortable and flattering.The material is another win, as it’s light and breathable. Whether you’re traveling overseas or in a hot area, it does an excellent job of keeping you cool and comfortable throughout the day.This shirt has not only become a wardrobe staple but also a go-to choice for any travel adventure. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish option, especially for those on the go in warm climates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid shirt. Love the style. But...
reviews.reviewText: As title says I love the style and get a few comments on these shirts BUT they came with some very light brown marks on them. Ordered blue, white, and gray and 2 of them had marks. Not much at all and in not very visible placing and did get lighter with a wash but I get that's what you get for this style shirt at this price range.Love the mock collar! Very light weight and looks and fits great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Casual
reviews.reviewText: I chose and really like Number 2 white. I am 6'2" and a slender 170 pounds. The LARGE has 37" sleeves for my long arms, although I will roll up anyway. It is full cut in the body, too wide for my slender frame but nice for loose fit. Most guys my height are heavier and wider. The 80% Cotton/ 20% FLAX is very comfortable. The material is thin but will be great for hot/humid days. It appears it will need gentle care when washing/drying...read instructions. Happy I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great quality
reviews.reviewText: Not great quality and sizing not accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a Christmas gift for my husband and it's absolutely beautiful. Easy to iron but stains are very hard to get out of linen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Casual and Cool shirt perfect for hot weather
reviews.reviewText: I bought this shirt to wear to a wedding on the beach in FL. Unfortunately COVID changed our travel plans and we didn't go to the wedding. I broke out the shirt for the first time to wear to a 50th bday party that was outdoors in 95 degree temps with 85%+ Humidity. It was brutal but I felt comfortable and cool the whole evening. I was worried a bit about sweating because of the color of the shirt but I was so comfortable that it never was an issue.Great styling and the fit was perfect for me to wear this untucked with some casual shorts. I am 6'4" and 220 lbs. Truly a super comfortable shirt. I can't comment on the durability as I have only worn it a couple of times but so far it is holding up fine. It is very lightweight (but that is kind of the point of a linen shirt) and therefore you feel cooler while you are wearing it. I have gotten multiple compliments on this shirt and a few people asking where I bought it.I would definitely recommend it for any hot weather or beach type events that require something a little more "dressy" but still very casual and comfortable. The fabric does wrinkle a lot so you either have to be obsessive about your ironing or just give it a quick iron and live with the wrinkles as they tend to go hand-in-hand with linen anyways. Great shirt, I was very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Knowing your fave shirt measurements is best
reviews.reviewText: Originally I had saved these in size large. however after measuring a shirt I already owned that fit well I purchased XL instead. That choice made for a perfectly fitting shirt that has me already planning to buy more of these for daily wear.Coming from a lifetime of jeans and t-shirt and never liking the overtly businessman or preppy looks options I've been looking for an button up long sleeve that could be at home in an office type setting AND wrenching in the garage. Paired with a vest these shirts make for a look that feels timeless in a true everyday man capacity. and at the cost of a band t shirt theses days you can afford to get one trashed working on that chopper project over the winter ;)

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena tela no ideal si tienes barriga
reviews.reviewText: El corte es muy estrecho en general si eres grande y pediste XL para no regarla ni el XL te va a quedar si no eres flaco y no flaco normal!!! Flaco anoréxico!!! La tela es buena está bien hecha pero las tallas son muy pequeñas.

el material de la camisa es bueno, de hecho bastante bueno para el precio.pero la talla viene muy pequeña, compre la 3XL con la intención de que me queue floja. pero la talla es tan pequeña que necesitaría pedir 1 medida mas grande para que quedara justa. y 2 medidas mas grandes para que me quedara como esperaba.en fin si eres una persona muy delgada si la recomiendo, pero pide una talla más grande de lo usual.

reviews.reviewTitle: I font like the material is so bad
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I need to return it back
I have bought a number of these shirts in various colours. This one was considerably larger than others despite all being M size.
